com.communote.server.core.tag

Class AbstractTagParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.tag.AbstractTagParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlankTagParser, CommaTagParser

    public abstract class AbstractTagParser
extends Object
implements TagParser
    A tag parser tags an string and splits them into single words (the tags) by a separator
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • buildTagString

        public <T extends TagName> String buildTagString(Collection<T> tags)
        This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags. It is the reverse method of findTags. The tags will not be sorted.
        Specified by:
        buildTagString in interface TagParser
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type implementing the TagName interface
        Parameters:
        tags - the tag list
        Returns:
        the tag list as string, separated by a tag separator

      • buildTagString

        public <T extends TagName> String buildTagString(Collection<T> tags,
                                                 boolean sort)
        This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags. It is the reverse method of findTags
        Specified by:
        buildTagString in interface TagParser
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type implementing the TagName interface
        Parameters:
        tags - the tag list
        sort - true if the list should be sorted by the name of the tags
        Returns:
        the tag list as string, separated by a tag separator

      • buildTagString

        public <T extends TagName> String buildTagString(String[] tags)
        This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags. It is the reverse method of findTags. The tags will not be sorted.
        Specified by:
        buildTagString in interface TagParser
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type implementing the TagName interface
        Parameters:
        tags - the tag list
        Returns:

        public String combineTags(String tagList,
                          String tagsToAdd)
        Combines two tags to a list.
        Specified by:
        combineTags in interface TagParser
        Parameters:
        tagList - A previous list of tags (or a single tag)
        tagsToAdd - The new tags to combine (or a single tag)

      • findOrCreateTags

        public Pair<List<Tag>,List<String>> findOrCreateTags(String unparsedTags)
        Parses the tags and gets them from the database, and creates them if necassary.
        Specified by:
        findOrCreateTags in interface TagParser
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - The unparsed tags
        Returns:
        A pair, where the left side are the created or found tags and the right site the tags with problems.

      • findTags

        public List<Tag> findTags(String unparsedTags)
        Parses the tags and gets them from the database. If the tag is not existing it will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        findTags in interface TagParser
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - The unparsed tags
        Returns:
        The tags

        Returns:
        the separator

      • parseTags

        public String[] parseTags(String unparsedTags)
        Parse a string of one or more tags into an array of tags. A null value will result in an empty array.
        Specified by:
        parseTags in interface TagParser
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - The unparsed tags
        Returns:
        The tags
